cause.description:
Striving to help support Boys and Girls club's in our area to continue to provide a place for local youth to play and study in a safe, supervised environment.
1. To provide a safe place for youth to learn and grow
2. To provide life-enhancing programs and character development experiences
3. To provide hope and opportunity
cause.mission: continue the work of our local Boys and Girls Club
cause.name: Boys and Girls Club of the Big Bend
